item.title: The Good, the Bad and the Weird of Vipassana Meditation
item.description: I completed the 10 day silent Vipassana Meditation course at the Dhamma Torana center outside Toronto, Canada. It was my first meditation course, and it was an interesting mix of enlightenment and a big test of self control. tl;dr: The 10 day Vipassana course is quite unpleasant but totally worthwhile. Yes, you should do it. Good Mental Benefits Meditation is peddled as a cure for problems in all aspects of your life.
